}} 'Passage' is a 2009 short drama film, directed by Shekhar Kapur, written by
Sheila Callaghan and Amy Kaufman, composed by A.R. Rahman, and starring Haley
Bennett, Julia Stiles and Lily Cole. [http://www.brand.swarovski.com/Content.Node/presscentre/news/news-
stagescreen/PASSAGE-POST-EVENT-Press-Release.pdf Press Release from
Swarovski] It was shot in Buenos Aires, Federal District, Argentina. The
film was raised by the Austrian company Swarovski and was played in their
Swarovski Crystal Worlds.
